message.body: He said the recruiter will be contacting me in a week or two to discuss possible next steps
Yay! Did they give you a timeframe on when you'll hear anything?
Lol beat me to it! That's so awesome!
The recruiter told me yesterday that there would probably be in person interviews too
So that's what the possible next steps are I'd imagine
So exciting! I am sure you will ace those too! Ill keep my fingers crossed!
Thanks :) I'm glad you checked up on me to see how it went
I wanted to earlier but I didn't know when it was! Lol thought I'd be safe now. :)
